General.Name: Fancl Corporation
General.Description: Fancl Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of cosmetics and dietary supplements. The company provides cosmetics, quasi-drugs, nutritional supplements, and other products in Japan and internationally. It also offers germinated brown rice and kale juice products; develops and distributes undergarments and fashion goods; and distributes cosmetics and nutritional supplements. In addition, the company operates as an insurance agency. It sells its products through online and catalogue, direct store, and wholesale channels. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.
